title: Paypal
meta_description: A visual helper for the 5 requirements needed for a PayPal account password on their website and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be between 7 and 32 characters long
Must contain a mix of letters, numbers, and/or special characters
Must not have only letters or only numbers
Single quotes, double quotes, ampersands, and spaces are not allowed
Cannot be the same as your Merchant Login name

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Passwords may be flagged if they contain part of your company name or user name, or follow a pattern from previous passwords.
